page.title: 11PLACES TO VISIT NEAR L'MOUTH
page.content: There are many interesting places within easy reach of Lossiemouth. {ELGIN}is 6 miles to the south where there is a ruined cathedral,which was founded in 1204,known as the{LANTERN {OF THE NORTH.FORRES}is 18 miles west,overlooked by a tower which was built in 1645.{INVERNESS},known as{ the{CAPITAL OF THE HIGHLANDS},lies 44miles further west.15 miles to the east of Lossiemouth lies{FOCHABERS} on the River Spey,the fastest flowing river in Scotland.In Fochabers there is a world-famous food-processing plant.Visitors are welcome.There is also a Folk Museum attached to it.
